# Bernouilli { #water_tank.random.Bernouilli }

`random.Bernouilli(self, values, p=0.5)`

Bernouilli (binomial) distribution, returning the first of the two values with probability $p$.

## Parameters

| Name     | Type   | Description                               | Default    |
|----------|--------|-------------------------------------------|------------|
| `values` | list   | list of values.                           | _required_ |
| `p`      | float  | probability of returning the first value. | `0.5`      |

## Methods

| Name | Description |
| --- | --- |
| [sample](#water_tank.random.Bernouilli.sample) | Samples from the distribution and returns an array of the desired shape. |

### sample { #water_tank.random.Bernouilli.sample }

`random.Bernouilli.sample(self, shape)`

Samples from the distribution and returns an array of the desired shape.
